post.author: 고상호
post.content:
The Official Canadian Temperature Conversion Chart:
50° Fahrenheit (10° C) · Californians and Floridians shiver uncontrollably · Canadians plant gardens
35° Fahrenheit (1.6° C) · Italian Cars won't start · Canadians hand wash the car then drive with the windows down
32° Fahrenheit (0° C) · Water freezes · Tim's iced capuccinos last longer
0° Fahrenheit (-17.9° C) · New York City landlords finally turn on the heat. · Canadians have the last barbecue/pool party of the season
-60° Fahrenheit (-51° C) · Exposed flesh freezes in minutes · Canadian Girl Guides sell cookies door-to-door
-109.9° Fahrenheit (-78.5° C) · Carbon dioxide freezes and makes dry ice · Canadians pull down their ear-flaps and say: "Cold, eh?"
-173° Fahrenheit (-114° C) · Ethyl alcohol freezes. · Canadians get frustrated when they can't thaw the keg
-460° Fahrenheit (-273° C) · Absolute zero; all atomic motion stops · Hell freezes over · The Toronto Maple Leafs win the Stanley Cup
post.title: Canadian Temperature Conversion Chart
